price: Kuma ka ambaci bãwan Mu Ayyũba* a lõkacin da ya kirãyi Ubangijinsa, ya ce: "Lalle nĩ, Shaiɗan yã shãfe ni da wahala da kuma wata azãba."
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ عَبۡدَنَآ أَيُّوبَ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ بِنُصۡبٖ وَعَذَابٍ
footnotes: * Wannan ƙissa tanã nũna haƙuri ga riƙon iyãli, mulkin ƙasã da mulkin gida duka daidai suke, sai yadda Allah Ya yi umurni a yĩ su. Haka mallakar rai idan mutum bai bi umurnin Allah ba a cikinsu, sai su buwãye shi tsarewa, kamar yadda mulkin ƙasa ke buwãya a riƙe shi tãre da kãfirci da zãlunci.

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
